text: Akiko Wada (born April 10, 1950) is a Japanese singer, talent, presenter, actress, and radio personality. Her talent agency is Horipro Inc. (her tenure is the longest among female talents and overall). Her record company is Universal Music. Her real name is Akiko Iizuka (maiden name: Wada). She was born as a Korean resident of Japan and later became a naturalized Japanese citizen. Her real name before naturalization was Kim Bok -ja ( ), and her common name was Gimhae Bok-ja (Kaneumi Fukuko) . Her nicknames are Akko, Ako, and God Sister.
title: Akiko Wada
